Functionality
-------------
This is an modular multiplatform chat bot written in Python 3, supporting hot reloading, and a variety of commands.

### Platforms

- [x] PokemonShowdown 
- [x] Discord
- [x] Slack

### Documention
Check out [this site](wlgranados.github.io/quadbot) for documentation!
